dublinCore.dc:title: S231 ENR: Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2013
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.congress: One Hundred Thirteenth Congress of the United States of America
form.enrolled-dateline: Begun and held at the City of Washington on Friday, the third day of January, two thousand and fourteen
form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES
form.official-title: To reauthorize the Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp Reauthorization Act of 2013.
Section 2(c)(2) of the Multinational Species Conservation Funds Semipostal Stamp Act of 2010 (39 U.S.C. 416 note) is amended by striking 2 years and inserting 6 years.

attestation-group.role: Speaker of the House of Representatives
Vice President of the United States and President of the Senate
